1: GOD is King, robed and ruling, GOD is robed and surging with strength. And yes, the world is firm, immovable,
3: Sea storms are up, GOD, Sea storms wild and roaring, Sea storms with thunderous breakers.
4: Stronger than wild sea storms, Mightier than sea-storm breakers, Mighty GOD rules from High Heaven.
5: What you say goes--it always has. "Beauty" and "Holy" mark your palace rule, GOD, to the very end of time.
